name: js-object-mapper
description: Mapper library for transforming JavaScript Objects

scripts.cov: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report none --dir ./.coverage -- test/ --reporter spec && istanbul report --root ./.coverage --dir ./.coverage
scripts.check: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report none --dir ./.coverage -- test/ --reporter spec && istanbul check-coverage --statements 90 --functions 90 --lines 90 --branches 90
